message: Let's split it down the middle. What do you say, Bob?
I'll take the high road, but you'll have to settle for less.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still not giving up much. What's your next move, Bob?
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
I'm trying to be reasonable, Bob. Meet me in the middle?
I'm not budging, but I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
I'm going back to a 50-50 split. Will you finally accept, Bob?
